metadata.title: CVE-2015-9383 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
FreeType before 2.6.2 has a heap-based buffer over-read intt_cmap14_validate in sfnt/ttcmap.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9383` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.4
libfreetype6 - 2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.4').
